universal.welcome: Bienvenido al Centro Médico de la Universidad de Tennessee!
universal.sdohformname: Herramienta de Evaluación de Necesidades Sociales

sdohPage.introtext1: Many living and working conditions can impact your health. At The University of Tennessee Medical Center, we're committed to better understanding our patients where they live, work, and play.
sdohPage.introtext2: By taking a moment to answer some questions, you'll contribute to the development of valuable resources that will benefit our patients in the future.
sdohPage.participation: Please answer a few questions about your life.
sdohPage.housingSecurity: Are you worried about stable housing?

housingCondition.label: Think about the place you live. Do you have problems with any of the following?

sdohPage.foodSecurity: Worried about running out of food?
sdohPage.foodAccess: Food bought didn't last and couldn't get more?
sdohPage.healthcareAccess: Distance or transportation prevent doctor visits?
sdohPage.childcareAccess: Childcare problems make it difficult to work or study?
sdohPage.educationAccess: Do you have a high school diploma?
sdohPage.financialSecurity: How often do you not have enough money to pay bills?
sdohPage.physicalSecurity: How often does anyone physically hurt you?
sdohPage.emotionalSecurity: How often does anyone insult or talk down to you?
sdohPage.safetySecurity: How often does anyone threaten you with harm?
sdohPage.wellbeingSecurity: How often does anyone scream or curse at you?
sdohPage.legalStatus: Spent more than 2 nights in jail/prison in the past year?
sdohPage.requestHelp: Would you like help with any of these needs?
sdohPage.sdohConsentProgram: Share information with local groups for resources?
sdohPage.sdohConsentHelp: Share information with UT Medical Center affiliates?

validation.maxLength: First name must be at most 20 characters
Last name must be at most 20 characters

failedPage.errorMessage: Sorry! Your form submission failed, please try again.

successPage.closeMessage: You may now close this browser window.
